name: UFO Lander - lunar lander mission - explore cosmos
name_original: UFO Lander - lunar lander mission - explore cosmos
description:
Main objective of UFO Lander game is to pilot a flying saucer and to land on all landing platforms. Try to use as less fuel as possible because end result is dependent on how much fuel has left at the end of the level. Game is very hard and challenging.

UFO lander game contains the following features:
-20 levels
-Awesome graphic
-Leaderboard
-Achievements
-You can upgrade fuel capacity, handling and acceleration of your UFO
